## üìò How to Use It

üñ±Ô∏èüëâ Click on ALL in the menu.

üìú Scroll through your Dots to explore everything you‚Äôve created.

üñ±Ô∏èüîç Select any Dot to open and review it.

‚úèÔ∏èüí¨üì§ Edit, comment, or share it if needed.

### üí° Tips

* Use the search bar with ALL to quickly find older Dots.

* Scroll faster with your mouse wheel.
